        Throws:

      • startVideoCapture

        void startVideoCapture(String screenName)
                throws IOException,
                       AWTException
        Start video capture with screenName.avi in DOWNLOAD_FILES_FOLDER folder.
        Parameters:
        screenName - name of output file (video file).
        Throws:
        IOException - if file or directory is wrong.
        AWTException - if configuration video file is wrong.
